channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic; INC#1513; 08:55PM; 14800 W Pacific Coast Hw; MAP: https://bit.ly/3of3Rhu; Pacific Palisades; A multi-vehicle collision (estimated 5 cars) with a total of 7 patients, 2 in critical condition and 2 with non-life threatening injuries (ages/genders not available). Any queries regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 4046 No further details. ; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E269 E63 E69 EM17 EM9 HR3 RA23 RA69 RA837 RA892 T69 UR88; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1507; 06:57PM; 456 W 68th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GGsWID; #VermontSlauson; *Address Corrected* 36 LAFD Firefighter took just 14 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire in a vacant and boarded one-story home. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; AR1 BC13 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA57 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 15; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1507; 06:43PM; 6824 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3UFBftK; #VermontSlauson; PRELIM: Vacant and boarded one-story home well involved with fire.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E233 E266 E46 E66 RA57 SQ21 T33 T66; CH9; 15; Brian Humphrey

Update Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0426; 08:50AM; 9601 N Zelzah Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3A0ghMS; #Northridge; Only 5 of the 8 patients assessed are desirous of ambulance transport, and will be taken to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics, for non-life threatening injuries. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1160); FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E287 E70 E87 EM15 RA107 RA7 RA828 RA839 RA87 RA872 T87; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#0426; 08:24AM; 9601 N Zelzah Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3A0ghMS; #Northridge; PRELIM: As many as eight patients being evaluated, all with minor injury. No entrapment. No further details.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E287 E70 E87 EM15 RA107 RA7 RA828 RA839 RA87 RA872 T87; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire Correction - 04/12/2023 INC#0155

item.description: Update Correction - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0155; 05:10AM; 6740 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MHSpFv; #VanNuys; Upon very close examination, debris within the heavily damaged and smoke charged building that strongly resembled a burnt pet canine thankfully proved NOT to be an animal. We are pleased to confirm there have been no human or animal injuries related to this Greater Alarm blaze, which remains under active investigation.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E100 E102 E239 E273 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E73 E81 E88 E89 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 RA88 RA889 RA903 T39 T73 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH8; 13 15 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/12/2023 INC#0155

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0155; 04:30AM; 6740 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MHSpFv; #VanNuys; One pet dog was discovered deceased in a second floor business. Firefighters will remain at scene past dawn to complete extinguishment of smoldering debris and assist in the formal investigation into the cause of the fire, which involved several units, led to surface fire on the roof, and caused structural compromise to a facade. No human injuries have been reported.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AR1 BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E100 E102 E239 E273 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E73 E81 E88 E89 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 RA88 RA889 RA903 T39 T73 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 15 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/12/2023 INC#0155

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0155; 04:23AM; 6740 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MHSpFv; #VanNuys; 126 LAFD Firefighters took 56 minutes to access, confine and extinguish stubborn fire that involved as many as three units in a 15,500 square foot two-story office building. No injuries reported. The fire's cause remains under active investigation.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E100 E102 E239 E273 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E73 E81 E88 E89 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 RA88 RA889 RA903 T39 T73 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 15 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/12/2023 INC#0155

item.description: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0155; 04:10AM; 6740 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MHSpFv; #VanNuys; With 126 LAFD personnel assigned in offensive firefighting operations battling stubborn flames in at least three units, this incident remains a Greater Alarm incident with no injuries reported.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E100 E102 E239 E273 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E73 E81 E88 E89 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 RA88 RA889 RA903 T39 T73 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 15 18; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0155; 03:27AM; 6740 N Kester Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MHSpFv; #VanNuys; PRELIM: 100' x 100' two-story office building with heavy fire in one unit.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC15 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E100 E102 E239 E273 E288 E289 E290 E298 E39 E73 E81 E88 E89 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA39 RA81 RA839 RA88 RA889 RA903 T39 T73 T88 T89 T90 T98 UR88 UR89; CH9; 13 18; Brian Humphrey
